casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Miller BAKER. No. 35P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 5, 2016. Brendan O'Donnell, for Baker, William Miller. David Gordon, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Jennifer Harjo, Wilmington. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of February 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of February 2016."
